asiri - (04/12/2008 14:29): :O  
asiri - (04/12/2008 14:29): how could xwikibot leave ?  
asiri - (04/12/2008 14:29): oh, it's back :)  
vmassol - (04/12/2008 14:30): asiri: I think you should rename all pages related to webdav with the WebDAV prefix. WDYT?  
asiri - (04/12/2008 14:31): vmassol: sounds ok.  
xwikibot - (04/12/2008 14:31): Drafts.Davfs was modified by xwiki:XWiki.asiri - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Drafts/Davfs  
vmassol - (04/12/2008 14:31): this is to differentiate them from other pages which will be located in the same space  
asiri - (04/12/2008 14:31): yes, ok.  
asyd - (04/12/2008 14:32): it is possible to manage attachments permissions? I want to give (read) access to a page to a group, the page have an attachment, but I don't want members of this group are able to download the attachment  
xwikibot - (04/12/2008 14:32): Drafts.XWikiWebDAV was modified by xwiki:XWiki.VincentMassol (Renamed title to WebDAV) - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Drafts/XWikiWebDAV  
xwikibot - (04/12/2008 14:32): Drafts.Davfs was modified by xwiki:XWiki.asiri - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Drafts/Davfs  
vmassol - (04/12/2008 14:33): asyd: you'll need to modify the attachment template to do that   
asyd - (04/12/2008 14:33): oh, interesting, thanks  
asyd - (04/12/2008 14:33): I'll take a look  
asyd - (04/12/2008 14:33): btw, if you want have few minutes of fun  
asyd - (04/12/2008 14:34): http://www.flm.fr/index.php/?2008/12/04/2557-remi-kart  
vmassol - (04/12/2008 14:36): fun :)

asyd - (04/12/2008 14:53): 13  
asyd - (04/12/2008 14:53): oups  
asiri - (04/12/2008 14:53): vmassol: is it bad practice to use "-" in page names ? i was using it to separate page names from prefix "WebDAV" .. :-/  
vmassol - (04/12/2008 14:54): asiri: yes it's bad practice  
asyd - (04/12/2008 14:54): ah  
asyd - (04/12/2008 14:54): why? I \*need\* it in pagesnames :/  
vmassol - (04/12/2008 14:54): asyd: you do what you want  
vmassol - (04/12/2008 14:54): I'm just talking about xwiki.org here ;)  
asyd - (04/12/2008 14:54): ok :)  
asyd - (04/12/2008 14:55): after create a small cmdb/monitoring app using xwiki, I now create a small DMS, still for the GIE CB :)  
vmassol - (04/12/2008 14:55): nice

vmassol - (04/12/2008 14:59): asiri: some small comments: you can use <tt>   
vmassol - (04/12/2008 14:59): also ":" should not have a space before it  
vmassol - (04/12/2008 14:59): I've also removed all the nbsp you had put since they're not required  
vmassol - (04/12/2008 14:59): I've also removed the image sizes and empty link= param  
vmassol - (04/12/2008 15:00): have a look at http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Drafts/WebDAVDAVExplorer  
xwikibot - (04/12/2008 15:00): Drafts.WebDAVDAVExplorer was modified by xwiki:XWiki.VincentMassol - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Drafts/WebDAVDAVExplorer  
asiri - (04/12/2008 15:01): Thanks. I will note these comments and change all docs. :)  
xwikibot - (04/12/2008 15:01): Drafts.WebDAVDAVExplorer was modified by xwiki:XWiki.VincentMassol - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Drafts/WebDAVDAVExplorer  
vmassol - (04/12/2008 15:02): there are lots of small things like uppercase, too technical terms, etc  
asiri - (04/12/2008 15:02): vmassol: I restricted the image sizes to 600 (width) thinking otherwise they will be too large.  
asiri - (04/12/2008 15:02): oh, i see ..  
vmassol - (04/12/2008 15:03): asiri: also I don't think you should use the term " xwiki repository"  
vmassol - (04/12/2008 15:03): since I don't think anyone will understand it  
vmassol - (04/12/2008 15:03): I don't understand it for example  
asiri - (04/12/2008 15:03): ok :)  
xwikibot - (04/12/2008 15:03): Drafts.WebDAVDAVExplorer was modified by xwiki:XWiki.VincentMassol - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Drafts/WebDAVDAVExplorer  
vmassol - (04/12/2008 15:04): asiri: re screenshots you should try to take small ones  
asiri - (04/12/2008 15:04): vmassol: I think there should be a gap between images and texts, for an exmaple, in http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Drafts/WebDAVDAVExplorer don't you think some bullet points are squeezed between images ?  
vmassol - (04/12/2008 15:04): ie. they must be able to be fully visible on a 1024 pixel screen  
vmassol - (04/12/2008 15:04): that's including the right panels  
asiri - (04/12/2008 15:05): vmassol: re screenshots, shall i resize them (make them smaller) ?  
xwikibot - (04/12/2008 15:05): Drafts.WebDAVDAVExplorer was modified by xwiki:XWiki.VincentMassol - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Drafts/WebDAVDAVExplorer  
vmassol - (04/12/2008 15:05): asiri: re newlines, I've added htem  
xwikibot - (04/12/2008 15:05): Drafts.WebDAVDavfs was modified by xwiki:XWiki.asiri - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Drafts/WebDAVDavfs  
xwikibot - (04/12/2008 15:05): Drafts.WebDAV was modified by xwiki:XWiki.VincentMassol (Renamed links to Drafts.WebDAVDavfs following the rename of that page) - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Drafts/WebDAV  
xwikibot - (04/12/2008 15:05): Drafts.Davfs was modified by xwiki:XWiki.asiri (deleted document) - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Drafts/Davfs  
vmassol - (04/12/2008 15:06): asiri: re screenshots don't spend too much time but at least for new ones it's better to follow this rule  
asiri - (04/12/2008 15:07): vmassol: ok, but i almost finished all the guides :) except for Mac guides which i cannot write :(  
asyd - (04/12/2008 15:07): hmm, how is difficult to create a filter to every download url to check if the user belongs to a given group? Edit the attachment template is ok, but that doesn't forbidden to download the file if the user know the url :/  
vmassol - (04/12/2008 15:08): asyd: yes if you really need to frobid the download action you need to extend the DownloadAction.java class and register it in struts-config.xml instead of the original one  
asyd - (04/12/2008 15:08): ok, thanks  
xwikibot - (04/12/2008 15:09): Drafts.WebDAVDAVExplorer was modified by xwiki:XWiki.asiri - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Drafts/WebDAVDAVExplorer  
asiri - (04/12/2008 15:10): vmassol: If I resize the screenshots they will loose a lot of detail and make them unclear. That's why i used the larger ones and gave them a smaller display size so that users can click on them if they need to.  
vmassol - (04/12/2008 15:11): asiri: as I said the good solution is to take smaller screenshots  
vmassol - (04/12/2008 15:11): in all the ones I've seen you could have resized them before taking the snapshot  
vmassol - (04/12/2008 15:12): sometimes when it's not possible then yes we can do what you suggest  
asiri - (04/12/2008 15:12): ok  
vmassol - (04/12/2008 15:12): or take a screenshot of a subpart of the image
